movie_title: experience - English Word of the Day
introduction: Learn EnglishClass101's word of the day #shorts #English #EnglishClass101

vocabulary.example: The view from the mountaintop was absolutely incredible.

vocabulary.definition: in or to a foreign country or countries
vocabulary.example: She decided to study abroad in Spain for a semester.

vocabulary.definition: an evaluation or assessment of something previously discussed or learned
vocabulary.example: Let's have a review of the main points before the exam.

vocabulary.definition: participating or being included in an activity or event
vocabulary.example: The volunteers were very involved in organizing the charity event.

vocabulary.definition: a group of students meeting regularly to study a subject or subjects together
vocabulary.example: She attends a painting class every Saturday afternoon.

vocabulary.definition: an informative or instructive example or experience
vocabulary.example: The mistake taught him an important lesson about honesty.
